# RIINA

> RIINA (Rigorous Immutable Invariant, No Assumptions) is a formally verified programming language with Bahasa Melayu (Malaysian Malay) keywords, information flow control, and an effect type system where all security properties are mathematically proven in Coq.

## Quick Facts

- File extension: `.rii`
- License: MPL-2.0
- Repository: https://github.com/ib823/proof
- Full reference: 04_SPECS/language/RIINA_LANGUAGE_REFERENCE_AI.md

## Key Keywords

| Bahasa Melayu | English | Purpose |
|---|---|---|
| `fungsi` | fn | Function declaration |
| `biar` | let | Variable binding |
| `kalau` | if | Conditional |
| `lain` | else | Else branch |
| `pulang` | return | Return value |
| `padan` | match | Pattern matching |
| `untuk` | for | For loop |
| `kesan` | effect | Effect annotation |
| `rahsia` | secret | Secret type |
| `dedah` | declassify | Declassify data |

## Types

Primitives: `Nombor` (Int), `Teks` (String), `Benar` (Bool), `Kosong` (Unit)
Security: `Rahsia<T>` (Secret), `Bukti<T>` (Proof)
Effects: `Bersih` (Pure), `Tulis` (Write), `Baca` (Read), `Rangkaian` (Network), `Kripto` (Crypto)

## Minimal Example

```riina
fungsi tambah(x: Nombor, y: Nombor) -> Nombor kesan Bersih {
    x + y
}

fungsi utama() -> Nombor kesan Tulis {
    biar hasil = tambah(3, 4);
    cetak(hasil);
    pulang 0;
}
```

## Docs

- Full AI reference: /04_SPECS/language/RIINA_LANGUAGE_REFERENCE_AI.md
- Bahasa Melayu syntax spec: /01_RESEARCH/specs/bahasa/RIINA-BAHASA-MELAYU-SYNTAX_v1_0_0.md
